tool.name: Paradigm Web
tool.command:
five3_paradigm_webapi.py -user $user_name -api $api_key #if str($pathway) != 'None': -path $pathway #end if #if str($geneExp) != 'None': -exp $geneExp #end if #if str($cna) != 'None': -cna $cna #end if
#if $skip_em: -skip_em #end if
#if str($null_batches) != '': -null_batches $null_batches #end if
#if str($resume) != '': -resume $resume #end if -o $output
tool.help:
Interface to Five3 Genomics Paradigm Web API. Register for an account and API key at https://dna.five3genomics.com
Pathway File : A pathway file
Gene Exp Matrix : Tab delimited expression file with hugo in the first column and samples as subsequent columns
Copy Number Matrix : Tab delimited copy-number file with hugo in the first column and samples as subsequent columns
